person_say: I'm facing a new task and don't know where to start.
animal_say: No worries, starting something new can feel daunting! Bizy, the time management bee, can help you tackle that. Interested in meeting her?

person_say: Yes, I would love to meet Bizy the bee and get some help with managing my time better!
animal_say: Fantastic! Bizy will buzz in with some great time management tips. Let's go meet her!
